nodes.text: Kodu Terrafin was a male Arcona who worked for Jabba Desilijic Tiure.

He lived on the planet Tatooine and was an employee of Jabba the Hutt shortly before the Battle of Yavin. Kodu operated a landspeeder transport service and shuttled the Jizz band known as the Modal Nodes to the Star Chamber Café at the Lucky Despot Hotel where they were expected to perform at the Whiphid wedding of Lady Valarian and D'Wopp.
